law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 3, effective July 1, 2009. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 3, effective July 1, 2007. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 126, effective January 1, 2006. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 8, effective July 1, 2004.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/1/2007). Under the authority of KRS 7.135(1)(h), during codification a manifest clerical or typographical error occurring in 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 3(1), has been corrected by changing "detailed communications billing" to "detailed telecommunications billing" to conform with definitions for that section.
